short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group your Chrome Tabs the smart way!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Chrome Tabs, the ultimate tool designed to enhance your browsing experience by organizing and managing your Chrome tabs intelligently. Whether you're a casual user overwhelmed by numerous open tabs or a professional needing efficient tab management, Smart Chrome Tabs is here to streamline your workflow and boost your productivity.
